string.name: name
string.value: Gato Marrom

string.name: desc
string.value: Eles são bastante gentis por natureza, por isso, geralmente não ficam pedindo sempre comida. Eles não parecem obedecer muito aos donos.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um gatinho bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: name
string.value: Cão Marrom

string.name: desc
string.value: Eles são muito extrovertidos, estão sempre com fome e são ativos por natureza, por isso, não podem ficar sentados por muito tempo. Eles são muito obedientes aos donos.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um cachorrinho bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: name
string.value: Coelhinho Rosa

string.name: desc
string.value: São bem comportados e quietos, por isso, não precisam ser alimentados mais do que o normal. Eles são inteligentes e obedientes, mas também são teimosos.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um coelhinho bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: name
string.value: Mini Kargo

string.name: desc
string.value: Eles são muito ativos, por isso, ficam rapidamente com fome. Muito inteligentes, eles são bastante obedientes aos donos.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um Mini Kargo bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: name
string.value: Gatinho Preto

string.name: desc
string.value: Eles são bastante gentis por natureza, por isso, geralmente não ficam pedindo sempre comida. Eles não parecem obedecer muito aos donos.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um gatinho bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: name
string.value: Coelho Branco

string.name: desc
string.value: São bem comportados e quietos, por isso, não precisam ser alimentados mais do que o normal. Eles são inteligentes e obedientes, mas também são teimosos.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um coelhinho bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: desc
string.value: Bastante ativos, mas às vezes se acalmam. Comem com moderação. Muito espertos no geral.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um Husky bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: name
string.value: Porco Preto

string.name: desc
string.value: Muito ativo e sempre faminto. Precisam ser alimentados muitas vezes. Muito amigáveis por natureza, são fáceis de criar laços de amizade.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um porquinho preto bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: desc
string.value: Calmo, relaxado e gentil. Sempre com vontade de mastigar algo. Muito raro.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um panda bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: desc
string.value: Um adorável bebê dinossauro macho, muito ativo e imprevisível.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um dinossauro bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: desc
string.value: Uma bebê dinossauro fêmea adorável, muito ativa e imprevisível.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era uma dinossaura bonitinha, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-la de volta à vida...

string.name: desc
string.value: O sempre curioso macaco que nunca descansa e sempre corre por aí.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um macaquinho bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: name
string.value: Tigre Branco

string.name: desc
string.value: Eles são muito gentis e obedientes por natureza e ficam amigos do dono com facilidade, o que ajuda a subir de nível.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um tigre bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: desc
string.value: Bastante extrovertido e maduro, precisa ser alimentado o tempo todo. Um bicho inteligente que entende facilmente os comandos do seu mestre.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um elefantinho bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: desc
string.value: Todo Natal, Papai Noel sobe no trenó puxado pelo seu fiel companheiro Rudolph.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um Rudpolph de nariz vermelho e bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: desc
string.value: Eles são espertos e obedientes por natureza, entendendo os comandos mais rápido do que os outros bichos, mas também ficam rapidamente famintos.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um Dasher bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: name
string.value: Robô

string.name: desc
string.value: Um hiper-ativo robô que sempre muda de opinião sobre tudo. Bastante imprevisível, porém fácil de agradar.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um robô bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: desc
string.value: Bastante ativos, mas às vezes se acalmam. Comem com moderação. Muito espertos no geral.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um Husky bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: name
string.value: Mini Yeti

string.name: desc
string.value: Um bicho confiável que guarda calmamente a retaguarda de todo mundo. Quieto, mas inteligente, é capaz de fazer muitas tarefas.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um Mini Yeti bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: desc
string.value: Bastante encantador e intuitivo, mas não tão obediente como outros bichos.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um macaquinho bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: desc
string.value: Não muito ativo, quieto e bem comportado por natureza. Não é muito obediente, mas não fica com fome muitas vezes.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um Peru bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: desc
string.value: Pinguins são sempre bem dispostos e espirituosos, sempre dispostos a uma viagem.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um Pinguim bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: name
string.value: Balrog Jr.

string.name: desc
string.value: Uma mascote tão leal quanto esquentada. Apesar da aparência, ela é insegura e tímida.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um lindo Balrog Jr., mas como a "Água da Vida" secou, ele voltou a ser um boneco. Mais um pouco de água e um pouco de mágica podem trazê-lo a vida novamente...

string.name: name
string.value: Porco Dourado

string.name: desc
string.value: Este Porco Dourado com certeza trará boa sorte para você!

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um porquinho dourado bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: name
string.value: Sun Wu Kong

string.name: desc
string.value: Sun Wu Kong fugiu de Tang Shan Zhang. Ele é preguiçoso e muito temperamental, mas tudo pode ser mudado com um pouco de carinho.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um lindo Sun Wu Kong, mas como a "Água da Vida" secou, ele voltou a ser um boneco. Mais um pouco de água e um pouco de mágica podem trazê-lo a vida novamente...

string.name: name
string.value: Ovo de Dragão

string.name: desc
string.value: Um ovo especial que, quando chocado, se transforma no mítico Dragão Bebê.

string.name: name
string.value: Dragão Bebê

string.name: desc
string.value: Um Dragão Bebê chocado do Ovo de Dragão especial. No Nível 15, o bichinho pode evoluir para um Dragão Adulto com a ajuda de Garnox, o NPC que usa a Rocha da Evolução.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um Dragão Bebê bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: name
string.value: Dragão Verde

string.name: desc
string.value: Misteriosos poderes mágicos preparados com sucesso evoluíram o Dragão Bebê em um Dragão Verde!

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um Dragão Verde bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: name
string.value: Dragão Vermelho

string.name: desc
string.value: Misteriosos poderes mágicos preparados com sucesso evoluíram o Dragão Bebê em um Dragão Vermelho!

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um Dragão Vermelho bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: name
string.value: Dragão Azul

string.name: desc
string.value: Misteriosos poderes mágicos preparados com sucesso evoluíram o Dragão Bebê em um Dragão Azul!

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um Dragão Azul bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: name
string.value: Dragão Negro

string.name: desc
string.value: Misteriosos poderes mágicos preparados com sucesso evoluíram o Dragão Bebê em um Dragão Negro!

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um Dragão Negro bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: name
string.value: Coelhinho Negro

string.name: desc
string.value: São bem comportados e quietos, por isso, não precisam ser alimentados mais do que o normal. Eles são inteligentes e obedientes, mas também são teimosos.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um coelhinho bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: name
string.value: Ceifador Jr.

string.name: desc
string.value: Miniatura da morte encarnada. É um companheiro leal, mas audacioso e respondão.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um Ceifador Jr. bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: desc
string.value: Bastante ativos, mas às vezes se acalmam. Comem com moderação. Muito espertos no geral.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um Husky bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: name
string.value: White Monkey

string.name: desc
string.value: The always-cute White Monkey loves a watermelon. However, he sometimes turns into an angry Mama Monkey.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute White Monkey, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: desc
string.value: Uma pequena e adorável, além de muito pontuda, criatura. É uma mascote muito amável.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um lindo Porco-Espinho, mas como a "Água da Vida" secou, ele voltou a ser um boneco. Mais um pouco de água e um pouco de mágica podem trazê-lo a vida novamente...

string.name: name
string.value: Jr. Reaper

string.name: desc
string.value: This spooky little harvester of souls is happy to come along for the ride!

string.name: descD
string.value: Your spooky Jr. Reaper friend has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Boneco de Neve

string.name: desc
string.value: Um adorável Boneco de Neve que também é muito ativo. Às vezes, é um tanto grosso, mas quanto mais for amado, mais carinhoso se torna.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um Boneco de Neve bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: desc
string.value: A happy-go-lucky, orange mushroom that loves shiny stones.

string.name: descD
string.value: A formerly adorable orange mushroom that turned into an inanimate doll due to severe dehydration from Life Water. Breathe new life into the doll using a special kind of magic!

string.name: desc
string.value: This little Hedgehog is very opinionated, but loyal.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your spiny Hedgehog friend has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Tigre Laranja

string.name: desc
string.value: They are very gentle and obedient in nature, easily becoming friendly with the owner, which in turn speeds up the level-up process.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little white tiger, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: Gambá

string.name: desc
string.value: Calmo e quieto por natureza, deixa-se levar, esse excêntrico Gambá está sempre de bem com a vida e sempre se preocupa com seu visual.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um Gambá bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: desc
string.value: A happy and lively Orange Mushroom that LOVES Sparkling Rocks.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your lovely Orange Mushroom has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special egg that becomes a mythical Robo upon hatching.

string.name: name
string.value: Baby Robo

string.name: desc
string.value: A Baby Robo hatched out of the special Capsule. At Level 15, the pet can be evolved into a full-fledged Adult Robo with the help of Garnox the NPC using the Rock of Evolution.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute baby robo, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: name
string.value: Blue Robo

string.name: desc
string.value: Mysterious magical powers aligned and sucessfully evolved the Baby Robo into a Blue Robo!

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cool Blue Robo, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: name
string.value: Red Robo

string.name: desc
string.value: Mysterious magical powers aligned and sucessfully evolved the Baby Robo into a Red Robo!

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cool Red Robo, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: name
string.value: Green Robo

string.name: desc
string.value: Mysterious magical powers aligned and sucessfully evolved the Baby Robo into a Green Robo!

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cool Green Robo, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: name
string.value: Gold Robo

string.name: desc
string.value: Mysterious magical powers aligned and sucessfully evolved the Baby Robo into a Gold Robo!

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cool Gold Robo, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: name
string.value: Gorilla Robo

string.name: desc
string.value: Mysterious magical powers aligned and sucessfully evolved the Baby Robo into the rare and majestic Gorilla Robo!

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a magnificent Gorilla Robo, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: desc
string.value: Snail that is really hard to figure out.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Snail, but the magic has run out, and it turned back into a doll. Unfortunately, there's no way to revive this pet. Double-click on the doll to find out how to find a new pet.

string.name: name
string.value: Rudolph Cristal

string.name: desc
string.value: A estrela dos feriados desse ano. Ela projeta uma aura de nobreza e gentileza. Apenas disponível durante o fim do ano!

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um Rudolph de Cristal bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: desc
string.value: Eles são criaturas pacíficas, andam em grupos e adoram brincadeiras. Não esqueça também que eles adoram comer frutinhas!

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um Tucano bonitinho, mas como secou toda a “Água da Vida”, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta à vida...

string.name: name
string.value: Pato Branco

string.name: desc
string.value: Silly and foolish, but hard working and easy-going by nature, White Duck is easy to please, and enjoys good food and a swim.

string.name: descD
string.value: Era um magnifico Pato Branco, mas como secou toda a Água da Vida, voltou a ser um boneco. Uma pequena mágica pode trazê-lo de volta á vida...

string.name: name
string.value: Pink Bean

string.name: desc
string.value: A short and chubby pet summoned through the Goddess' mirror. It is temperamental.\n#cA pet whose life will never expire.#

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: name
string.value: Baby Tiger

string.name: desc
string.value: Baby Tiger, the big star of 2010.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a magnificent Baby Tiger, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: name
string.value: Weird Alien

string.name: desc
string.value: A strange alien that crash landed in the Maple World. It can't speak, but it is affectionate and deeply curious.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a strange alien, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: desc
string.value: Mir, a cute baby dragon that has just hatched from a dragon's egg.

string.name: descD
string.value: Mir, who has turned into a doll because the Water of Life has dried up.

string.name: desc
string.value: Ruby, a cute baby dragon that has just hatched from a dragon's egg.

string.name: descD
string.value: Ruby, who has turned into a doll because the Water of Life has dried up.

string.name: name
string.value: Bing Monkey

string.name: desc
string.value: A research monkey that helps Dr. Bing with his experiments...by posing as the test subject! This little monkey wears a suit as protection from the atmosphere.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a Visitor Research Monkey but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: name
string.value: Corgi Pup

string.name: desc
string.value: A playful and active Welsh Corgi.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your lovely Welsh Corgi has turned into a doll. You can revive it with Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: The always-curious monkey never rests, wanders around.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little monkey, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: Black Kitty

string.name: desc
string.value: They are quiet and gentle in nature, so they don't go craving for food too often. They don't seem to be too obedient of their owners.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little kitty, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: Penguins are always energetic and in good spirits. Use the Meso Magnet and Item Pouch on the Penguin to pick up the mesos and items on the ground.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Penguin, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: Baby Tiger

string.name: desc
string.value: Baby Tiger, the big star of 2010.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: name
string.value: Persian Cat

string.name: desc
string.value: An elegant and prim Persian Cat.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your lovely Persian Cat has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Esel is a mysterious unicorn looking for the right companion.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your lovely unicorn, Esel, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious cake, baked to celebrate MapleStory's Anniversary!

string.name: descD
string.value: A cake doll that was once alive. The "Water of Life" which sustained it has dried up.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious pie, baked to celebrate MapleStory's Anniversary!

string.name: descD
string.value: A pie doll that was once alive. The "Water of Life" which sustained it has dried up.

string.name: name
string.value: Black Bunny

string.name: desc
string.value: A black rabbit. Kind of rude and enjoys lecturing its owner.\n#cSkills: Meso Magnet#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your black rabbit has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Black Bunny

string.name: desc
string.value: A black rabbit. Kind of rude and enjoys lecturing its owner.\n#cSkills: Meso Magnet#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your black rabbit has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Tiel is an elegant unicorn that is looking for a good friend!

string.name: descD
string.value: Your elegant unicorn, Tiel, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Galiel is a sweet unicorn always ready for fun!

string.name: descD
string.value: Your lovely unicorn, Galiel, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Esel is a mysterious unicorn looking for the right companion.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your lovely unicorn, Esel, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Tiel is an elegant Unicorn, waiting for a good friend along with Esel.\n#cSkills: Meso Magnet, Item Pouch #

string.name: descD
string.value: Your elegant unicorn, Tiel, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Galiel is a lovely Unicorn who enjoys frolicking with Esel and Tiel.\n#cSkills: Meso Magnet, Item Pouch #

string.name: descD
string.value: Your lovely unicorn, Galiel, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Tubarão

string.name: desc
string.value: Shark in a bowl. Designed by Cristophery.\r\n #cMesos Pickup Skill learnt#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your cuddly Shark has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: A happy-go-lucky, orange mushroom that loves shiny stones.\n#cA pet whose life will never expire.#

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: name
string.value: White Tiger

string.name: desc
string.value: They are very gentle and obedient in nature, easily becoming friendly with the owner, which in turn speeds up the level-up process.\n#cA pet whose life will never expire.#

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: name
string.value: Mini Yeti

string.name: desc
string.value: A trustworthy pet that quietly watches everyone's back. Quiet, but smart and gets a lot of things done.\n#cA pet whose life will never expire.#

string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.value: Baby Tiger

string.value: Baby Tiger, the big star of 2010.

string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: Ruby, a cute baby dragon that has just hatched from a dragon's egg.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: name
string.value: Black Pig

string.name: desc
string.value: Very active and hungry at all times. Need to be fed often. Very friendly in nature, so it's easy to increase the level of closeness with it.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious cake, baked to celebrate MapleStory's Anniversary!

string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.value: A delicious pie, baked to celebrate MapleStory's Anniversary!

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: A playful and active Welsh Corgi.

string.value: Persian Cat

string.name: desc
string.value: An elegant and prim Persian Cat.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: name
string.value: Jr. Reaper

string.name: desc
string.value: Miniature death incarnate. Makes for a loyal but cheeky sidekick that is prone to talking back.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: name
string.value: White Bunny

string.name: desc
string.value: They are well-behaved and quiet, so they don't need to be fed more than the usual amount. They are smart and obedient, but also stubborn.

string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mir, a cute baby dragon that has just hatched from a dragon's egg.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: Tiel is an elegant unicorn that is looking for a good friend! \n#cSkills: Meso Magnet, Item Pouch #

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: Esel is a mysterious unicorn looking for the right companion. \n#cSkills: Meso Magnet, Item Pouch #

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: Galiel is a sweet unicorn always ready for fun! \n#cSkills: Meso Magnet, Item Pouch #

string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.value: Fennec Fox

string.name: desc
string.value: A romantic fox from the desert. It claims to be from asteroid B-612.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: name
string.value: Merlion Pet

string.name: desc
string.value: Cute and cuddly Merlion. It's still a baby, so you'll have to take extra care not to hurt its feelings.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: Behold, the cute and talented Butterfly!

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: Shark in a bowl. Designed by Cristophery.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fluffy Puffram with a bright personality and a huggable belly.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: Craw is a chatty parrot who keeps watch from the crow's nest of pirate ships.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your chatty parrot, Craw, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Adriano is a surly pirate otter of few words.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your taciturn otter, Adriano, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Bonkey the gorilla acts as helmsman and powder monkey aboard a pirate ship.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your reliable powder monkey/gorilla, Bonkey, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Harp Seal

string.name: desc
string.value: Cute and cuddly Harp Seal. It's still a baby, so you'll have to take extra care not to hurt its feelings.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: Penguins are always energetic and in good spirits. Use the Meso Magnet and Item Pouch on the Penguin to pick up the mesos and items on the ground.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: name
string.value: White Duck

string.name: desc
string.value: Silly and foolish, but hard working and easy-going by nature, White Duck is easy to please, and enjoys good food and a swim.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: name
string.value: Silver Husky

string.name: desc
string.value: Active, yet calm at times. Can be moderately fed. Very smart in general.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: name
string.value: Pink Yeti

string.name: desc
string.value: A trustworthy pet that quietly watches everyone's back. Quiet, but smart and gets a lot of things done.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Mini Pink Yeti, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: A well-fed Bandit that loves to eat, especially Ramen.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: name
string.value: Miracle Cat

string.name: desc
string.value: Magic is what powers this lovely feline. Meow! \n#cSkill: Meso Magnet, Item Pouch#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your lovely Miracle Cat has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Pink Bean

string.name: desc
string.value: Behold, the cute and talented Pink Bean! There are many secrets beneath its adorable surface…

string.name: descD
string.value: Your cute Pink Bean has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Corgi Pup

string.name: desc
string.value: The spunky little Corgi Pup! It sure loves that Blue Birdy.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your energetic Corgi Pup has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Craw is a chatty parrot who keeps watch from the crow's nest of pirate ships.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your chatty parrot, Craw, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.value: Adriano is a surly pirate otter of few words.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your taciturn otter, Adriano, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Bonkey the gorilla acts as helmsman and powder monkey aboard a pirate ship.

string.value: Your reliable powder monkey/gorilla, Bonkey, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Fennec Fox

string.name: desc
string.value: A romantic little Fennec Fox that claims to have come from Planet B612.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your Fennec Fox has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Corgi Pup

string.name: desc
string.value: The spunky little Corgi Pup! It sure loves that Blue Birdy.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your energetic Corgi Pup has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Storm Dragon

string.name: desc
string.value: A great and regal dragon who carries the legendary Dragon Orb.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your Storm Dragon has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: It may waddle a lot, but this Penguin sure is as diligent and affectionate as they come!

string.name: descD
string.value: Your diligent Penguin has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Pirate Parrot

string.name: desc
string.value: The sea-loving Pirate Parrot, friend of pirates and squawker of the seven seas!

string.name: descD
string.value: The sea-loving Pirate Parrot has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Metus, a mischievous demon who preys on fear.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your mischievous demon has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mos, a melancholy demon who controls death.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your melancholy demon has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Invidia, a tomboy demon who revels in jealousy.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your jealous demon has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Chunky

string.name: desc
string.value: A well-fed raccoon that loves to eat, especially Ramen.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your portly Raccoon has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Brown Burro

string.name: desc
string.value: A colt with wings that thinks its an adventurer. It may be a bit clumsy, but its still kinda cute.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your winged Brown Burro has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: A spirit of darkness that follows Hilla. A bit arrogant and tends to look down on other people.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your spirit of darkness, Blackheart, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Harp Seal

string.name: desc
string.value: A cute and charming Harp Seal. Still just a baby, it's feelings are hurt easily. So you have to take good care of it.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your cuddly Harp Seal has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Puffram's radiant personality and outgoing nature is sure to charm any would-be owner.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your fluffy Puffram has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Demon Metus

string.name: desc
string.value: Metus, a mischievous demon who preys on fear.\nEquip the demon pet to obtain the #cDemon's Noble Blessing Skill#, which will grow in power as you equip more demons.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your scary demon has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Demon Mors

string.name: desc
string.value: Mors, the melancholy master of death. \nEquip the demon pet to obtain the #cDemon's Noble Blessing Skill#, which will grow in power as you equip more demons.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your scary demon has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.value: Demon Invidia

string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mors, the melancholy master of death. \nEquip the demon pet to obtain the #cDemon's Noble Blessing Skill#, which will grow in power as you equip more demons.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: Invidia, the demoness of jealousy.\nEquip the demon pet to obtain the #cDemon's Noble Blessing Skill#, which will grow in power as you equip more demons.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: As charming as it is polite, Starwing is always a crowd pleaser!

string.name: descD
string.value: Your polite Starwing has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Baby Tiger

string.name: descD
string.value: Your cuddly baby tiger has turned into a doll. You can revive it with Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cute and cuddly baby tiger.

string.name: desc
string.value: Beware the water! A prickly, temperamental shark might be lurking inside.\nSummon this shark to get the #cShark School Skill#, which increases in power as you summon more shark pets (up to 3).

string.name: descD
string.value: Your prickly shark has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Pink Bean

string.name: desc
string.value: The color of this Pink Bean can be changed!\nSummon this Pink Bean to get the #cPink Bean Mania# skill, which increases in power as you summon more Bean pets (up to 3).

string.name: descD
string.value: Your wuvable Pink Bean has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fluffy Puffram with a bright personality and a huggable belly. Cannot be revived with Water of Life.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your cuddly Puffram has turned into a doll. You can't revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Pink Dragon

string.name: desc
string.value: A cute Pink Dragon. \nSummon this dragon to get the #cDragon's Amazing Blessing# skill, which increases in power as you summon more dragon pets (up to 3).

string.name: descD
string.value: Your cute dragon has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Ice Dragon

string.name: desc
string.value: A cute Ice Dragon.\nSummon this dragon to get the #cDragon's Amazing Blessing# skill, which increases in power as you summon more dragon pets (up to 3).

string.name: descD
string.value: Your cute dragon has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Red Dragon

string.name: desc
string.value: A cute Red Dragon.\nSummon this dragon to get the #cDragon's Amazing Blessing# skill, which increases in power as you summon more dragon pets (up to 3).

string.name: descD
string.value: Your cute dragon has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Pink Bean

string.name: desc
string.value: A Pink Bean that can change color.\nYou'll learn #cPink Bean Mania# skill when you equip Pink Bean Pet. Equip more Pink Beans to enhance this skill.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your adorable Pink Bean has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Red Elly

string.name: desc
string.value: Very outgoing and mature; doesn't need to be fed all the time. An intelligent pet that easily understands the commands from the master.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Red Elly, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: name
string.value: Blue Burro

string.name: desc
string.value: A donkey with wings that thinks its an adventurer. It may be a bit clumsy, but its still kinda cute.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your Blue Burro has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cute and cuddly Merlion. It's still a baby, so you'll have to take extra care not to hurt its feelings.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: Behold, the cute and talented Butterfly!

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: A bouncy little kangaroo who thinks he's the toughest guy this side of the outback.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your Kangaroo has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: The star of this year's Holidays. Projects an aura of nobility and gentleness. Only available during the winter Holidays!

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a magnificent Crystal Rudolph, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: name
string.value: Pink Bean

string.name: desc
string.value: A Pink Bean that can change color.\nYou'll learn #cPink Bean Mania# skill when you equip Pink Bean Pet. Equip more Pink Beans to enhance this skill.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your adorable Pink Bean has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Fluffy Teddy

string.name: desc
string.value: A snuggly Fluffy Teddy.\nEquip this bear to obtain the #cBear Necessities# skill, which will grow in power as you equip more bear pets. \n#cSkills: Auto Buff, Meso Magnet, Item Pouch#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your snuggly Teddy has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Cutie Teddy

string.name: desc
string.value: A cuddly Cutie Teddy.\nEquip this bear to obtain the #cBear Necessities# skill, which will grow in power as you equip more bear pets.\n#cSkills: Auto Buff, Meso Magnet, Item Pouch#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your snuggly Teddy has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Puffy Teddy

string.name: desc
string.value: A fluffy Puffy Teddy.\nEquip this bear to obtain the #cBear Necessities# skill, which will grow in power as you equip more bear pets.\n#cSkills: Auto Buff, Meso Magnet, Item Pouch#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your snuggly Teddy has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Pumpkin Jack

string.name: desc
string.value: This little trickster just loves Halloween. \nEquip this pumpkin to obtain the #cPumpkin Peril# skill, which will grow in power as you equip more pumpkin pets. This pumpkin will also grow along with you. Eventually, it will reach Giant status and cast a particularly phantasmic buff on you every 5 minutes! \n#cSkill: Fatten Up, Auto Buff, Meso Magnet, Item Pouch#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your sinister Pumpkin has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Pumpkin Zack

string.name: desc
string.value: This little hooligan just loves Halloween. \nEquip this pumpkin to obtain the #cPumpkin Peril# skill, which will grow in power as you equip more pumpkin pets. This pumpkin will also grow along with you. Eventually, it will reach Giant status and cast a particularly phantasmic buff on you every 5 minutes! \n#cSkill: Fatten Up, Auto Buff, Meso Magnet, Item Pouch#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your sinister Pumpkin has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Pumpkin Mack

string.name: desc
string.value: This little goon just loves Halloween. \nEquip this pumpkin to obtain the #cPumpkin Peril# skill, which will grow in power as you equip more pumpkin pets. This pumpkin will also grow along with you. Eventually, it will reach Giant status and cast a particularly phantasmic buff on you every 5 minutes! \n#cSkill: Fatten Up, Auto Buff, Meso Magnet, Item Pouch#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your sinister Pumpkin has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Prince Thumpy

string.name: desc
string.value: This rabbit is the highlight of any fashion party. Can only be acquired through the Maple Style system.\n#cSkill: Meso Magnet, Item Pouch#

string.name: descD
string.value: The fashionable Prince Thumpy has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: This little Hedgehog is very opinionated, but loyal.\n#cSkills: Meso Magnet, Item Pouch#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your spiky Hedgehog has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Fennec Fox

string.name: desc
string.value: A romantic little Fennec Fox that claims to have come from Planet B612. \n#cSkills: Auto Buff, Meso Magnet, Item Pouch, Movement Radius Increase#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your romantic little Fennec Fox has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Frumpy Koala

string.name: desc
string.value: A really indifferent Koala. \nEquip this koala to obtain the #cEucalyptus Calypso# skill, which will grow in power as you equip more koala pets. This koala will also grow along with you. Eventually, it will reach Giant status and cast a particularly awesome buff on you every 5 minutes! \n#cSkills: Eucalyptus Calypso skill#

string.name: descD
string.value: This Fashionista Koala pet is inanimate, having lost the Water of Life. Special magic is required to revive it.

string.name: name
string.value: Grumpy Koala

string.name: desc
string.value: A really grouchy Koala. \nEquip this koala to obtain the #cEucalyptus Calypso# skill, which will grow in power as you equip more koala pets. This koala will also grow along with you. Eventually, it will reach Giant status and cast a particularly awesome buff on you every 5 minutes! \n#cSkills: Eucalyptus Calypso skill#

string.name: descD
string.value: This Fashionista Koala pet is inanimate, having lost the Water of Life. Special magic is required to revive it.

string.name: name
string.value: Nerdy Koala

string.name: desc
string.value: A really nerdy Koala. \nEquip this koala to obtain the #cEucalyptus Calypso# skill, which will grow in power as you equip more koala pets. This koala will also grow along with you. Eventually, it will reach Giant status and cast a particularly awesome buff on you every 5 minutes! \n#cSkills: Eucalyptus Calypso#

string.name: descD
string.value: This Fashionista Koala pet is inanimate, having lost the Water of Life. Special magic is required to revive it.

string.name: name
string.value: Chipper Chipmunk

string.name: desc
string.value: A playful Chipper Chipmunk. \nEquip this chipmunk to obtain the #cStronger Squirrel# skill, which will grow in power as you equip more chipmunk pets. This chipmunk will also grow along with you. Eventually, it will reach Giant status and cast a particularly awesome buff on you every 5 minutes!\n#cSkill: Fatten Up, Auto Buff, Meso Magnet, Item Pouch#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your playful chipmunk pet has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Munchy Chipmunk

string.name: desc
string.value: A playful Munchy Chipmunk. \nEquip this chipmunk to obtain the #cStronger Squirrel# skill, which will grow in power as you equip more chipmunk pets. This chipmunk will also grow along with you. Eventually, it will reach Giant status and cast a particularly awesome buff on you every 5 minutes!\n#cSkill: Fatten Up, Auto Buff, Meso Magnet, Item Pouch#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your playful chipmunk pet has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Chubby Chipmunk

string.name: desc
string.value: A playful Chubby Chipmunk. \nEquip this chipmunk to obtain the #cStronger Squirrel# skill, which will grow in power as you equip more chipmunk pets. This chipmunk will also grow along with you. Eventually, it will reach Giant status and cast a particularly awesome buff on you every 5 minutes!\n#cSkill: Fatten Up, Auto Buff, Meso Magnet, Item Pouch#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your playful chipmunk pet has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Vile Metus

string.name: desc
string.value: Metus, the furious demon, is back, and looking to get bigger than ever!\nEquip this demon to obtain the#cDemon's Pact skill#, which will grow in power as you equip more Demon pets. This demon will also grow along with you. When it gets big enough, it will even cast an awesome buff on you. #cSkill: Demon's Pact skill#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your scary demon has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Dire Mors

string.name: desc
string.value: Mors, the sullen demon, is back, and looking to get bigger than ever!\nEquip this demon to obtain the#cDemon's Pact skill#, which will grow in power as you equip more Demon pets. This demon will also grow along with you. When it gets big enough, it will even cast an awesome buff on you. #cSkill: Demon's Pact skill#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your scary demon has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Wild Invidia

string.name: desc
string.value: Invidia, the jealous demon, is back, and looking to get bigger than ever!\nEquip this demon to obtain the#cDemon's Pact skill#, which will grow in power as you equip more Demon pets. This demon will also grow along with you. When it gets big enough, it will even cast an awesome buff on you. #cSkill: Demon's Pact skill#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your scary demon has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet Gingerhead who started following humans to avoid being eaten.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your sweet Gingerhead Man has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Blue Dragon

string.name: desc
string.value: Mysterious magical powers aligned and sucessfully evolved the Baby Dragon into a Blue Dragon!

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cool Blue Dragon, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: desc
string.value: A super cheerful Roo-bot that slipped out of Gelimer's lab during Xenon's escape. \nEquip this Roo-bot to obtain the #cRoo-bot Shuffle# skill, which will grow in power as you equip more Roo-bot pets. This Roo-bot will become bigger as you fight monsters around your level. Eventually, it will reach Giant status and cast a particularly awesome buff on your every 5 minutes. \n#cSkills: Roo-bot Shuffle#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your upbeat little Roo-bot has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: A frightened little Roo-bot that slipped out of Gelimer's lab during Xenon's escape. \nEquip this Roo-bot to obtain the #cRoo-bot Shuffle# skill, which will grow in power as you equip more Roo-bot pets. This Roo-bot will become bigger as you fight monsters around your level. Eventually, it will reach Giant status and cast a particularly awesome buff on your every 5 minutes. \n#cSkills: Roo-bot Shuffle#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your scared little Roo-bot has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: A spunky and clever Roo-bot that slipped out of Gelimer's lab during Xenon's escape. \nEquip this Roo-bot to obtain the #cRoo-bot Shuffle# skill, which will grow in power as you equip more Roo-bot pets. This Roo-bot will become bigger as you fight monsters around your level. Eventually, it will reach Giant status and cast a particularly awesome buff on your every 5 minutes. \n#cSkills: Roo-bot Shuffle#

string.name: descD
string.value: Your witty little Roo-bot has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: As charming as it is polite, Starwing is always a crowd pleaser!

string.name: descD
string.value: Your polite Starwing has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Yeti Robot

string.name: desc
string.value: How do you make a Yeti better? Expensive cyborg parts! This beast is bigger, stronger, and way more roboty!

string.name: descD
string.value: Your cuddly Yeti Robot has turned into a doll. You can't revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Red Dragon

string.name: desc
string.value: Mysterious magical powers aligned and successfully evolved the Baby Dragon into a Red Dragon!

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cool Red Dragon, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. You can't revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: name
string.value: Honey Angel

string.name: desc
string.value: A soft and sweet Honey Angel. \nEquip to obtain the #cAngelic Choir Skill#, which grows stronger as you equip more Angel pets (Max 3).\nThis Angel will become bigger as you fight monsters around your level. Eventually, it will reach Giant status and cast a particularly awesome buff on you every 5 minutes.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your perfect little Angel has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.value: Lime Angel

Eventually, it will reach Giant status and cast a particularly awesome buff on you every 5 minutes.

Eventually, it will reach Giant status and cast a particularly awesome buff on you every 5 minutes.
